text: Madame X is the fourteenth studio album by American recording artist Madonna. It was released on June 14, 2019. The first single, "Medell√≠n", features Colombian singer Maluma and was released on April 17, 2019. The album became Madonna's ninth number-one album in the US when it entered at the top of the Billboard 200 chart with 95,000 equivalent units sold in its first week (including streams). Her last US number-one album was MDNA in 2012. == Track listing == Taken from Apple Music. The standard version of the album has 13 songs, while the deluxe has 15. === Standard version === ===Deluxe version=== == References == Category:Madonna albums Category:2019 albums Category:Pop albums
title: Madame X (album)
